name: WantedVR
description:
I own an Oculus Quest without the oculus link so I'm not gonna be able to assure you that it works on every Oculus headsets. However having used the "oculus integration kit" I think that only the oculus will be supported, sorry for the others, I would try to be interested in the unity XR kit to open access to more people! 

I hope you will enjoy it !
